name: Panda TK Hoody
description:
Full revamp of our original "Just A Panda" design in collaboration with London-based graphic artist Toby K.

The design features the Panda with a Mary J. laurel wreath, the number 112 in Roman numerals, and the OOLOO logo below the graphic.

Toby's "TK" signature on the right sleeve. T-shirts are available as well.

name: Panda TK
description:
Full revamp of our original "Just A Panda" design in collaboration with London-based graphic artist Toby K.

The design features the Panda with a Mary J. laurel wreath, the number 112 in Roman numerals, and the OOLOO logo below the graphic.

name: Oolien Bowl
description:
OOLOO's official brand mascot, the Oolien, gets its own official glass bowl in collaboration with me Glassworks! Head to outer space with some extraterrestrial intergalactic class.

Only 30 bowls were created, a bunch were sold at Cannabis Cup 2011 in Amsterdam, AND these remaining few survived the first ever police raid of the Cup in 24 years. The green and cobalt blue colors sold out!

Chuuwee x Jonathan Lowell - French Inhale

» Bowls come in translucent charcoal black, or solid black.

» Bowls are approximately 6-7 inches in length.

» Many thanks to Matt of meGlassworks!

name: Just A Panda
description:
The Giant Panda is a bear native to central-western and south western China. It is distinguishable by large, black patches around its eyes, muzzle, ears, limbs, and across its round, furry body.

It lives on a diet consisting of 99% bamboo. But when available, it also enjoys fish, eggs, honey, oranges, and bananas. The Giant Panda is quite the connoisseur!

[ Click the arrow to read more ]

On average, the Giant Panda eats as much as 20-30 lbs of bamboo shoots a day. Because this diet is low in nutrition, it must eat often in order to stay full. The Giant Panda also limits its energy expenditures by avoiding social interactions and steep terrain.

During mating, females crouch in a head-down position as the male will mount her from behind. Copulation time is brief, ranging anywhere from thirty seconds to five minutes, but the male may mount her repeatedly to ensure that fertilization is successful. After mating, the male leaves the female alone to raise the cub.

It's just a panda. Waving, eating some bamboo, and living life.

A lazy, irresponsible panda* maybe, but still just a panda.

[ Reference: Wikipedia ]
[ *Disclaimer: Characteristics of the Giant Panda do not reflect that of our model. ]

name: BubbleBum
description:
BUBBLEBUM is the original soft and extra juicy dime piece available in regular and hater free. Comes in a variety of colours, personalities, and delicious flavours! Plenty of fun to be had with every bite!

BUBBLEBUM dime pieces come in our patented “sof-tee” wrapping. This ensures that the minimum legal amounts of freshness and flavour are locked into every piece.

Please see packaging for BUBBLEBUM’s nutritional information.

[ Surgeon General’s Warning: If not taken proper care of, BUBBLEBUM may become extremely hazardous to your health. Too much of a good thing can be bad sometimes, so please enjoy in moderation. ]

» model is wearing size extra small

» model is approx. 5’4” in height, 110 lbs/50 kg in weight

» printed on 100% cotton in light pink

» low crew neck, form-fitting, longer than a typical tee

» to see design in full, click here

» for important sizing info, click here

Detailed Sizing Info

Our women’s tees use American Apparel and are 100% sheer jersey cotton, which provide a super duper soft feel to the shirt. They are considered “summer shirts” so the fabric is nice and thin, and are of superb quality and construction, so you can count on them to hold up for a very long time. They are form-fitting and are longer than your average tee, and also feature a low crew neck for greater breathability. Despite being labeled as a summer shirt, we believe that our designs, matched with American Apparel’s high standards of quality, are great shirts to wear all year round!

To maintain the shirt, we recommend washing in cold water, inside out, as well as hanging to dry.

name: I’m Not A Hater
description:
Since "hater" is not yet an official entry in the dictionary - which it obviously should be, Urban Dictionary defines it as:

  1. A person that simply cannot be happy for another person’s success. So rather than be happy, they make a point of exposing a flaw in that person.
  2. Overused word that people like to use just because someone else expresses a dislike for a certain individual.

But you're no hater, right?

name: The Oolien
description:
The Oolien is no stranger to this planet we humans have built, conquered, and destroyed. In fact, it has been observing us for a very long time, but its presence did not make itself known...

Until now.

[ Click the arrow to read more ]

Scientists believe that the Oolien originates from the ATOolien quadrant of the Milky Way Galaxy. It is estimated that the Oolien has been preparing for its introduction to Earth since 1981.

From the little information that has been gathered, it seems that the Oolien people follow the beat of their own drum. They refuse to be conventional in a universe chock-full of formulaic mediocrity. They are rhythmic in nature, and intellectualize every point of interest that may come across their paths in life.

They think, and they groove.

Unfortunately, these characteristics make it difficult for the average human being to comprehend them. The Oolien people understand that this planet is very divided, especially among its human inhabitors. The average human being is extremely close-minded, and immediately judges others based on his/her own exceptionally flawed and limited senses of morality and reality.

But the Oolien does not fear any of this, and nothing will halt its introduction to the world. Hatred is not a part of the equation. Its people may be difficult to understand, but the truth will come to those who pay honest attention.

So relax your mind, let your conscious be free, and accept your fate.

We come in peace.
